meanings.sent1: I need to resharpen my pencil before I can continue drawing.
meanings.sent2: After using the knife, I always resharpen it to keep it sharp.
meanings.sent3: I tried to resharpen my focus during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent4: She resharpened her skills through continuous practice.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to resharpen the knife to slice the tomatoes effortlessly.
